name: [ Acknowledgements (Dyptich) ]
description:
[ Acknowledgements (Dyptich) ]
Ecco the Dolphin: Hauntologies (Vol. 4)
Composited .mp4 video, 23 seconds, 1408 x 1060 px
2021


** ROM Corruption and game photography of "Ecco the Dolphin: Defender of the Future" (2000) for Sega Dreamcast **


Record of Provenance:
https://glitchphotography.tumblr.com/post/668603619323543552/


!!!! this piece is dedicated to 5 friends who helped bring me to the point of creating this series: Dawnia, Sky, Canek, Wade, and Rodell. I'm so grateful for your love and support, not only within the NFT space, but also from the old school tumblr/fb days. I'm grateful for the remixes. I'm grateful for all the conversations and twitter threads about Ecco that inspired me to crack this game and admire the plants !!!!



// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // @sabatobox // www.sabatobox.com //
